Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Target has completely ended its "Heroes & Helpers" program, when in fact, Target plans to continue the program.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Target has ended the program.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Target ended the program to distance themselves from police officers, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for any changes or modifications to the program, such as the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on organizing such events.
